availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert Enders (Paducah retired merchant and planter)

body.p: Paducah, McCracken County, Kentucky retired merchant and planter. Virginia native. Married Amanda Bradford Enders in 1826. Married Malvina Bradford Enders after 1832. Held twenty-two slaves in 1860.

bibl.p: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 1, p. 141. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, District 2, Paducah, p. 16. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, McCracken County, Precinct 6, p. 33. Genealogies of Virginia Families, From Tylerâ€™s Quarterly Historical and Genealogical Magazine, Volume I: Albridgton-Gerlache (Baltimore, MD: Genealogical Publishing Co for Clearfield Company, 2007), p. 193-195.
